simonetta.name: Simonetta Salamano
simonetta.bio: Graduated in Architecture from the Politecnico di Torino, she has been practicing professionally since 1990. She specializes in interior design and concept development, with particular attention to spatial layout studies and the quality of living environments. She accompanies clients in their choices of materials, colors, lighting, and furnishings, directly following the most creative phases of the project and offering personalized support including selections at showrooms and suppliers. She has deepened her expertise in renovation, with experience in residential, educational, healthcare, banking, and corporate environments, with an approach oriented toward the balance between functionality and expressiveness.

paola.name: Paola Ferro
paola.bio: Graduated in Architecture from the Politecnico di Torino, she has been practicing professionally since 1991. She specializes in architectural and urban design, construction management, and coordination of design processes, with consolidated experience in relations with public entities and private clients. She follows the operational phases of the project and construction site, coordinating contracts, companies, and professionals through to the final delivery of works. Her approach is oriented toward construction quality, control of the implementation process, and attention to themes of sustainability, energy efficiency, and living comfort.
